channel.title: I tried making a shop thing from scratch but I have one problem yet
channel.description: I tried making a shop thing from scratch but I have one problem yet. I got the shop to work when you use the npc, and I got the inventory to show up in the shop. But I cant get it to let you sell items to it, or buy items from it. Does anyone have an idea on how to do this?

item.title: I tried making a shop thing from scratch but I have one problem yet
item.dc:creator: @bjc22 bjc22
item.description:
@bjc22 wrote:

Read my post.
If you know what winterloves is, There is no shop thing for it, I made the npc thing, but the shop thing’s problem (explained above) is still bothering me.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 11, 2007, 06:40:32 PM[/size][hr]Never mind I figured it out, YAY!

Read full topic
item.source: I tried making a shop thing from scratch but I have one problem yet

item.title: I tried making a shop thing from scratch but I have one problem yet
item.dc:creator: @Paulthegoat2 Paulthegoat2
item.description:
@Paulthegoat2 wrote:

You have to edit the Shops.Cfg file. That is were you place the “shop items”
